亡くなった両親の思いは
その名前にずっと残るのだからな
google_translated:
The thought of parents who died
It's because it will stay for that name

en_text: We were both loved by our parents.
jp_text: お互い 両親に愛されていたのさ
google_translated: They were loved by each other

en_text: Don't cry!
jp_text: （テレサ）泣くな
google_translated: Do not cry

en_text: A woman with a lonely soul.
jp_text: （クレア）孤独な魂の女
google_translated: Woman of lonely soul

en_text: A girl with a lonely soul.
jp_text: 孤独な魂の少女
google_translated: Lonely soul girl
